title: Figure, "Rooster", 20th century
description: Fantastic, rooster-like bird, crested, with head turned, looking over back. On rock-like brown base with green spots, slightly iridescent. Bird has large yellow claws with black stripes. pale, robin's egg blue breast streaked with black. Red-spotted crest, and salmon, blue, lavendar, green, tan, plumage and long tail streaked and lined with gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Rooster", 20th century.
20th century. porcelain. Gift of J. Lionberger Davis. 1968-1-26.
